title: draven bug??
body:
used draven's ult before and hit the center of my target and did no damage to the hero. think its a bug that needs to be fixed.
not to sure how to tell riot about it.

has any one else had the same bug?

replies.body:
I thought that Draven's ult was two separate hit-boxes with a small space between them, that if you position correctly you can not get hit by the blades.

Did his ult automatically start returning to you after it supposedly 'hit' the centre of your target?
